Emamode Edosio, Onye a maara dịka Ema, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri na Naijiria. O nwetara nzere bachelọ nke sayensị (Bsc) na sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Ogun Steeti
Ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri dijitalụ na New York Film Academy (NYFA) na ihe nkiri na Motion Pictures Institute nke Michigan, United States
O nwetara ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye nduzinke afọ site na onyinye sisterhood.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri dị ka 66 Dimension na 2007
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Hip Hop TV, Clarence Peters na Capital Dreams Pictures, EbonyLife TV na dịka onye nchịkọta akụkọ na BBC
Ema laghachiri ụlọ akwụkwọ na Abuja iji mụtakwuo ihe nkiri
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dịka “” Joy Ride’, “Ochuko’ ma duzie Kasala.
A mụrụ Edosio n'ụlọ ndị nke Kraịst
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ n'ime ụmụ asaa n'ezinụlọ ahụ
Nna ya bụ onye lara ezumike nká na nne ya bụ onye ọka iwu

Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Loral Nursery and Primary School, Festac town, Lagos mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara Federal Government College, Odogbolu ruo afọ ole na ole wee gụchaa agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na S-tee Private Academy, Festac Town
O nwetara BSc na sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Olabisi Onabanjo, tupu ọ gaa mụọ ihe nkiri dijitalụ na NYFA na ihe nkiri na Motion Picture Institute of Michigan
Ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa n'afọ 2013 mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na US. Na Naịjirịa, Ema rụrụ ọrụ na 66 Dimension, Hip Hop TV, Clarence Peters na Capital Dreams Pictures, Ebonylife Tv na BBC
Dị ka onye nduzi, Ema esorola ndị omenkà ama ama dịka TuFace, 9ice, Lord of Ajasa, Terry da Rapmanand na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ. A na-akpọ ọrụ mbụ ya na Ebonylife Tv "Heaven"
